slotProps.description: The props used for each component slot.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

series.deprecationInfo: use .areaElementClasses.root[data-series="${seriesId}"] instead. This class will be removed in the next major version. Styles applied to the root element for a specified series. Needs to be suffixed with the series ID: .${areaElementClasses.series}-${seriesId}.

slotDescriptions.area: The component that renders the area.
